events.message: I received the incorrect item in my order and would like to request a refund because it doesn't match what I purchased.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to wrong item delivery as per customer's report.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item delivered.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number, so we can verify and process your refund?
Here is the photo of the item I received, along with my order number 1234567. The item is completely different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We have initiated your refund which should be processed back to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and refund processing. I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
The refund case has been marked as resolved after confirming the customer's satisfaction with the proposed solution.
Following up to confirm that you have received the refund. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
This case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support and letting us resolve your refund issue efficiently.
We’ve sent a satisfaction survey to hear about your experience with our support regarding this refund.
